name: Pirate Hunter - Defend The Beach From Incoming Boats
name_original: Pirate Hunter - Defend The Beach From Incoming Boats
description:
Defend the beach from oncoming enemy boats. Maneuver around to avoid crashing and sinking your vessel, but don't let too many ships get by you or it's game over. Sink as many pirates as you can and upgrade your ship with better weaponry and armor.

Beat your high score and climb the leaderboard!
